attributes.action: Vote in Parliament on whether or not to trigger Article 50 of EU Treaty.
attributes.background: This is the first time a country will have left the EU and considering the near 50:50 referendum outcome it should now be a Parliamentary decision and vote to decide on invoking Article 50 or not.

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133540
